inquest.translation[0].definitions[0].de: a legal process to find out the cause of someone’s death
inquest.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: The inquest heard that she died from multiple injuries.
The coroner will hold an inquest into the deaths.
inquest.translation[0].definitions[1].de: an unofficial discussion about the reasons for someone’s defeat or failure to do something
inquest.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: The Tories will hold a private inquest into why they were defeated.
